item.title: Why I Chose AWS Over Digital Ocean
item.description: There’s no shortage of shills for Digital Ocean VM hosting on HackerNews lately. They extol the wonder of DO and disparage AWS. I view these accumulations of calumnies with curiosity, searching for the cogent retorts from AWS mavens. Finally, I broke down and threw $5 at a DO plan to see what I was missing. Turns out I’m not missing a thing. The Good Modern CSS feel with candy buttons and very simple, limited UI Grandma could launch a VM Expense How do the shills keep yowling that DO is cheaper than EC2?
